snippet: Ashton B. Carter, President Obama’s nominee to become defense secretary, underwent what an administration official called “a long-planned surgical procedure on his back” on Friday.
abstract: Ashton B Carter, Pres Obama’s nominee to become defense secretary, undergoes back surgery; is slated to begin his confirmation process in 2015, when Republicans take control of Senate.
lead_paragraph: Ashton B. Carter, President Obama’s nominee to become defense secretary, underwent what an administration official called “a long-planned surgical procedure on his back” on Friday.

headline.main: Defense Nominee Ashton Carter Has Back Surgery

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
